backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing schools, teachers, and trainings with CRUD-like add functions and query retrieval including search and filtering by school.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and related components for Google Maps, reusable map component, and similar schools.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all frontend pages, components, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global background/foreground setup.
frontend/index.html: HTML root file loading the React app entrypoint and defining the document structure.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing setup using TanStack Router with global layout, theme provider, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/directory/School: School card component showing key school info, training badges, teacher count, and navigation to the detail page.
frontend/src/components/directory/Teache: List component rendering teacher cards with avatars and specialization badges or an empty state message.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright, attribution link with UTM tracking, and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo navigation and light/dark theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/school/faqConten: Exports a list of default FAQ items for school pages.
frontend/src/components/school/FAQSectio: FAQ accordion component rendering a list of questions and answers inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/school/ImageGall: Displays a gallery of images with a modal viewer, using default images if none are provided.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolMap: Shows a Google Maps embed and link for a school location, with fallback when no location is provided.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolVid: Embeds a YouTube video after extracting its ID or shows a placeholder if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/school/SimilarSc: Fetches and displays similar schools with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolCardData.ts: Loads a school's trainings and teachers via the backend actor for card-level display.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolDetails.ts: Fetches detailed school, teacher, and training data with shared loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Retrieves all schools and optionally filters them by matching training hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimilarSchools.ts: Hook that fetches schools and scores them by matching training hours to return top similar schools.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables, theme tokens, and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Directory page showing filterable school listings with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx: School detail page displaying school info, trainings, media sections, teachers, and similar schools with loading and error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, OKLCH color mappings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing requirements, features, known issues, and current build state.
